source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_00<tab>Jantellot wants you to experience firsthand what life at the Convictory is like.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_00<tab>聖フィネア連隊の露営地のジャントゥローは、冒険者に眷属狩りを勧めようとしている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_01<tab>Jantellot wants you to know what life is like at the Convictory, and suggests a bit of hunting as an example. Though the Convictors slay dragons, Jantellot recommends a warm-up before confronting the Dravanian Horde itself. He suggests hunting rheums instead. Locate and slay three rheums.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_01<tab>ジャントゥローから、ドラゴン族の眷属狩りをする前に肩慣らしをしないかと提案された。クルザス西部高地のツインプールズで「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D9A01 /var>」を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_02<tab>You venture out into the highlands and slay the rheums as instructed. Return to Jantellot at the Convictory and let him know that you are ready for something a bit more draconic.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D9A01 /var>を討伐した。聖フィネア連隊の露営地の「ジャントゥロー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_03<tab>Jantellot congratulates you on your kills. It seems that the rheums were no match for you. But dragons are another thing altogether. He suggests you speak with him again some time if you want to try your hand at the real thing.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_SEQ_03<tab>ジャントゥローに報告した。次は眷属狩りの本番のため、準備が整ったら再びジャントゥローに声をかけよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_000<tab>I remember you─how could I forget? You're the <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> who was in the Azure Dragoon's company! Since you are here anyway, perhaps you might like to try your hand at a spot of hunting before you depart? See for yourself what life is like for us Convictors.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_000<tab>……お前、かなり腕が立つんだろ？
どうだい、せっかく「聖フィネア連隊の露営地」に来たんだ、
ドラゴン族の眷属狩りを楽しんでみないか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_001<tab>The Dravanian Horde is stronger than you might expect. Unless you've been at it for years─like I have─I think it prudent to start with something simple and then work your way up to dragons. I suggest rheums. Slay three of those, then come back here. Consider it a warm-up!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_001<tab>だが、眷属とはいえ、相手はなかなかに手強い……。
まずは肩慣らしに、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D9A01 /var>」を3体ほど倒してくるといい。
ほらほら、物は試しって言うだろう？　さっそく行ってみろよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_010<tab>The Horde has claimed more than a few overconfident young soldiers. Best to start with something a little safer: kill three rheums and then come back to me.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_010<tab>だが、眷属とはいえ、相手はなかなかに手強い……。
まずは肩慣らしに、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D9A01 /var>」を3体ほど倒してくるといい。
ほらほら、物は試しって言うだろう？　さっそく行ってみろよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_020<tab>Slain those rheums already, have you? How did you find them? Did they put up much of a fight?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_020<tab>おう、どうやら「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D9A01 /var>」を仕留めてきたみてぇだな。
どうだった、ヤツらもそれなりに歯ごたえがあったろう？
……え？　そうでもなかった？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_021<tab>Good work, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! Clearly the Azure Dragoon doesn't travel with mere amateurs. It sounds like those rheums barely put up enough of a fight to be considered a proper warm-up!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_021<tab>ハハハハッ、なかなかやるじゃねえか。
「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20D9A01 /var>」程度の小物じゃ、肩慣らしにもならないってか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_022<tab>You clearly know what you're doing. If you want to try your hand at hunting down some dragons, speak with me again some time.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ111_01760_JANTELLOT_000_022<tab>それじゃあ、お次は本番と行こうじゃないか。
準備ができたら、声をかけてくれよな。
